robot_fault_prediction|robot_record|RecR: TEXT. Unique record registration identifier. PK. Example: RF100725.
robot_fault_prediction|robot_record|RecT: TIMESTAMP. Timestamp of the record creation. Not nullable. Possible values: 2025-02-18, 2025-02-19.
robot_fault_prediction|robot_record|BotC: TEXT. Unique robot code identifier. PK. Example: RB2073.
robot_fault_prediction|robot_details|Bot: TEXT. Foreign key to the robot_record table (BotCode). PK, FK to robot_record.
robot_fault_prediction|robot_details|Mfg: TEXT. Manufacturer name of the robot. Possible values: ABB, FANUC, KUKA, Universal Robots, Yaskawa.
robot_fault_prediction|robot_details|Mod: TEXT. Model series of the robot. Example: Series_784.
robot_fault_prediction|robot_details|Bot: CHAR(15). Type of the robot (e.g., industrial, collaborative). Possible values: Articulated, Cartesian, Collaborative, Delta, SCARA.
robot_fault_prediction|robot_details|Pay: REAL. Payload capacity of the robot in kilograms. Possible values: 3, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 200.
robot_fault_prediction|robot_details|Rea: BIGINT. Reach distance of the robot in millimeters. Example: 1592.
robot_fault_prediction|robot_details|Ins: DATE. Installation date of the robot. Example: 10 Jun 2023.
robot_fault_prediction|robot_details|FWV: TEXT. Firmware version of the robot. Example: 9.6.6.
robot_fault_prediction|robot_details|Ctr: TEXT. Control type of the robot (e.g., manual, automatic). Example: Controller_C2.
robot_fault_prediction|operation|OperReg: TEXT. Unique operation record identifier. PK.
robot_fault_prediction|operation|OperRec: TEXT. Foreign key to the robot_record table (BotCode). FK to robot_record.
robot_fault_prediction|operation|TotOpsH: REAL. Total operational hours of the robot. **NULL means no operational hours data available.**. Example: 20009.0.
robot_fault_prediction|operation|AppType: TEXT. Application type for the operation. **NULL means no application type specified.**. Possible values: Assembly, Material Handling, Painting, Palletizing, Welding.
robot_fault_prediction|operation|OperMod: CHAR(25). Operating mode of the robot (e.g., automatic, manual). Possible values: MANU.
robot_fault_prediction|operation|CurrPro: TEXT. Current program being executed by the robot. **NULL means no program is active.**. Example: PRG_4901.
robot_fault_prediction|operation|ProgCyc: BIGINT. Number of cycles executed by the robot. Example: 177681.
robot_fault_prediction|operation|CycleTi: REAL. Cycle time of the robot operation in seconds. **NULL means no cycle time data available.**. Example: 211.82.
robot_fault_prediction|operation|AxisCou: BIGINT. Number of axes in the robot. Possible values: 4, 5, 6, 7.
robot_fault_prediction|joint_performance: BIGSERIAL. Unique identifier for the joint performance record. PK.
TEXT. Foreign key to the operation table (OperReg). FK to operation.
TEXT. Foreign key to the robot_details table (BotDetReg). FK to robot_details.
robot_fault_prediction|joint_condition|J: BIGSERIAL. Unique identifier for the joint condition record. PK.
TEXT. Foreign key to the operation table (OperReg). FK to operation.
TEXT. Foreign key to the robot_details table (BotDetReg). FK to robot_details.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|Ac: TEXT. Unique actuation record identifier. PK.
TEXT. Foreign key to the operation table (OperReg). FK to operation.
TEXT. Foreign key to the robot_record table (BotCode). FK to robot_record.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|TC: REAL. TCP X-coordinate in mm. **NULL means TCP pose data unavailable.**. Example: 1275.23.
REAL. TCP Y-coordinate in mm. **NULL means TCP pose data unavailable.**. Example: 873.0.
REAL. TCP Z-coordinate in mm. **NULL means TCP pose data unavailable.**. Example: 1618.63.
REAL. TCP rotation around the X-axis in radians. Example: -156.28.
REAL. TCP rotation around the Y-axis in radians. Example: -150.3.
REAL. TCP rotation around the Z-axis in radians. Example: -6.26.
REAL. Speed of the TCP in mm/s. Example: 1231.14.
REAL. Acceleration of the TCP in mm/s². Example: 6.65.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|Pa: REAL. Path accuracy in mm. Example: 0.797.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|Po: REAL. Position error in mm. **NULL means no position error data available.**. Example: 0.069.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|Or: REAL. Orientation error in degrees. **NULL means no orientation error data available.**. Example: 0.471.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|Pa: REAL. Payload weight in kg. **NULL means no payload data available.**. Example: 144.85.
REAL. Payload current in Amps. Example: 1.78.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M1: REAL. Motor 1 current in Amps. **NULL means no motor 1 data available.**. Example: 6.58.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M2: REAL. Motor 2 current in Amps. **NULL means no motor 2 data available.**. Example: 8.61.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M3: REAL. Motor 3 current in Amps. **NULL means no motor 3 data available.**. Example: 3.31.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M4: REAL. Motor 4 current in Amps. **NULL means no motor 4 data available.**. Example: 14.16.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M5: REAL. Motor 5 current in Amps. **NULL means no motor 5 data available.**. Example: 6.16.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M6: REAL. Motor 6 current in Amps. **NULL means no motor 6 data available.**. Example: 1.81.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M1: REAL. Motor 1 voltage in Volts. Example: 1.26.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M2: REAL. Motor 2 voltage in Volts. Example: 15.66.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M3: REAL. Motor 3 voltage in Volts. Example: 10.6.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M4: REAL. Motor 4 voltage in Volts. Example: 9.13.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M5: REAL. Motor 5 voltage in Volts. Example: 28.47.
robot_fault_prediction|actuation_data|M6: REAL. Motor 6 voltage in Volts. Example: 32.12.
robot_fault_prediction|mechanical_status: TEXT. Foreign key to the actuation_data table (ActReg). FK to actuation_data.
TEXT. Foreign key to the operation table (OperReg). PK, FK to operation.
TEXT. Foreign key to the robot_details table (BotDetReg). FK to robot_details.
robot_fault_prediction|system_controller: TEXT. Foreign key to the actuation_data table (ActReg). PK, FK to actuation_data.
TEXT. Foreign key to the operation table (OperReg). FK to operation.
REAL. Load value of the system overseer. Example: 0.99.
REAL. Memory usage of the system overseer. Example: 32.07.
TEXT. Thermal level of the system overseer. Example: 38.5°C.
REAL. Cabinet temperature of the system overseer. Example: 33.84.
TEXT. Humidity level in the cabinet of the system overseer. Example: 47%.
robot_fault_prediction|maintenance_and_f: TEXT. Foreign key to the actuation_data table (ActReg). PK, FK to actuation_data.
TEXT. Foreign key to the operation table (OperReg). FK to operation.
TEXT. Fault code identifier. **NULL means no fault code provided.**. Example: E8902.
TEXT. Category of the issue in the fault. Possible values: COM, ELE, MEC, NON, SOF.
TEXT. Level of the issue in the fault. Possible values: Critical level, High level, Low level, Medium level, None level.
REAL. Fault prediction score. **NULL means no fault prediction score available.**. Example: 0.021.
TEXT. Fault type estimation. **NULL means no fault type estimation available.**. Possible values: Controller, Gearbox, Joint, Motor.
BIGINT. Remaining useful life in hours. Example: 1601.
BIGINT. Days until the next maintenance is due. Example: 16.
robot_fault_prediction|performance_and_s: TEXT. Foreign key to the actuation_data table (ActReg). PK, FK to actuation_data.
TEXT. Foreign key to the robot_details table (BotDetReg). FK to robot_details.
REAL. Condition index value of the robot. **NULL means no condition index data available.**. Example: 0.152.
REAL. Effectiveness index value of the robot. **NULL means no effectiveness index data available.**. Example: 0.603.
REAL. Quality measure value for the robot. **NULL means no quality measure data available.**. Example: 0.337.
TEXT. Energy use in KWH. **NULL means no energy usage data available.**. Example: 70.54 kWh.
TEXT. Power factor value. **NULL means no power factor data available.**. Example: PF=0.82.
REAL. Air pressure value in the system. Example: 6.69.
TEXT. Safety state value of the robot. Possible values: Warning, ✓ Normal, ✗ Emergency.
BIGINT. Number of zone violations. Example: 1.
BIGINT. Count of emergency stops. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.
BIGINT. Count of collisions. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3.
BIGINT. Count of overloads. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.
BIGINT. Number of speed violations. Example: 5.
CHAR(20). Calibration state value of the robot. Possible values: 0, N, Y.
BIGINT. Number of tool changes. **NULL means no tool change data available.**. Example: 940.0.

robot_fault_prediction|joint_performance.column_meaning: JSONB column. Captures the kinematic performance of every joint (angle, speed, and torque) in a single hierarchical JSON structure for quick retrieval.

J1.angle_deg: REAL. Joint 1 angle value in degrees. Example: -37.72.
J1.speed_dps: REAL. Joint 1 speed value in radians per second. Example: 36.74.
J1.torque_nm: REAL. Joint 1 torque value in Nm. Example: 12.0.

J2.angle_deg: REAL. Joint 2 angle value in degrees. Example: 177.36.
J2.speed_dps: REAL. Joint 2 speed value in radians per second. Example: 65.06.
J2.torque_nm: REAL. Joint 2 torque value in Nm. Example: 79.88.

J3.angle_deg: REAL. Joint 3 angle value in degrees. Example: 83.27.
J3.speed_dps: REAL. Joint 3 speed value in radians per second. Example: 174.45.
J3.torque_nm: REAL. Joint 3 torque value in Nm. Example: 55.91.

J4.angle_deg: REAL. Joint 4 angle value in degrees. Example: -151.1.
J4.speed_dps: REAL. Joint 4 speed value in radians per second. Example: 96.65.
J4.torque_nm: REAL. Joint 4 torque value in Nm. Example: 75.22.

J5.angle_deg: REAL. Joint 5 angle value in degrees. Example: -162.94.
J5.speed_dps: REAL. Joint 5 speed value in radians per second. Example: 167.12.
J5.torque_nm: REAL. Joint 5 torque value in Nm. Example: 2.14.

J6.angle_deg: REAL. Joint 6 angle value in degrees. Example: -72.08.
J6.speed_dps: REAL. Joint 6 speed value in radians per second. Example: 69.94.
J6.torque_nm: REAL. Joint 6 torque value in Nm. Example: 45.07.

robot_fault_prediction|joint_condition|j.column_meaning: JSONB column. Consolidates thermal, vibration, and backlash indicators that describe the health of each joint at the time of capture.

J1.temperature_C: REAL. Joint 1 temperature value in Celsius. Example: 20.57.
J1.vibration_mmps: REAL. Joint 1 vibration value in mm/s. Example: 1.14.
J1.backlash_deg: REAL. Joint 1 backlash value in mm. Example: 0.0352.

J2.temperature_C: REAL. Joint 2 temperature value in Celsius. Example: 39.54.
J2.vibration_mmps: REAL. Joint 2 vibration value in mm/s. Example: 1.636.
J2.backlash_deg: REAL. Joint 2 backlash value in mm. Example: 0.0272.

J3.temperature_C: REAL. Joint 3 temperature value in Celsius. Example: 42.16.
J3.vibration_mmps: REAL. Joint 3 vibration value in mm/s. Example: 1.687.
J3.backlash_deg: REAL. Joint 3 backlash value in mm. Example: 0.0946.

J4.temperature_C: REAL. Joint 4 temperature value in Celsius. Example: 34.88.
J4.vibration_mmps: REAL. Joint 4 vibration value in mm/s. Example: 3.264.
J4.backlash_deg: REAL. Joint 4 backlash value in mm. Example: 0.056.

J5.temperature_C: REAL. Joint 5 temperature value in Celsius. Example: 70.15.
J5.vibration_mmps: REAL. Joint 5 vibration value in mm/s. Example: 2.052.
J5.backlash_deg: REAL. Joint 5 backlash value in mm. Example: 0.0907.

J6.temperature_C: REAL. Joint 6 temperature value in Celsius. Example: 64.39.
J6.vibration_mmps: REAL. Joint 6 vibration value in mm/s. Example: 6.422.
J6.backlash_deg: REAL. Joint 6 backlash value in mm. Example: 0.046.

robot_fault_prediction|mechanical_status.column_meaning: JSONB column. Bundles together the real-time status of brakes, encoders, and gearbox health for easier diagnostics and alerting.

brakes.J1: TEXT. Brake 1 status. **NULL means no brake 1 status data available.**. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.
brakes.J2: TEXT. Brake 2 status. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.
brakes.J3: TEXT. Brake 3 status. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.
brakes.J4: TEXT. Brake 4 status. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.
brakes.J5: TEXT. Brake 5 status. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.
brakes.J6: TEXT. Brake 6 status. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.

encoders.J1: TEXT. Encoder 1 status. **NULL means no encoder 1 status data available.**. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.
encoders.J2: TEXT. Encoder 2 status. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.
encoders.J3: TEXT. Encoder 3 status. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.
encoders.J4: TEXT. Encoder 4 status. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.
encoders.J5: TEXT. Encoder 5 status. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.
encoders.J6: TEXT. Encoder 6 status. Possible values: Error, Normal, Warning.

J1.temperature_C: REAL. Gearbox 1 temperature in Celsius. Example: 24.92.
J1.vibration_mmps: REAL. Gearbox 1 vibration in mm/s. Example: 3.273.

J2.temperature_C: REAL. Gearbox 2 temperature in Celsius. Example: 79.14.
J2.vibration_mmps: REAL. Gearbox 2 vibration in mm/s. Example: 1.912.

J3.temperature_C: REAL. Gearbox 3 temperature in Celsius. Example: 56.76.
J3.vibration_mmps: REAL. Gearbox 3 vibration in mm/s. Example: 1.361.

J4.temperature_C: REAL. Gearbox 4 temperature in Celsius. Example: 35.39.
J4.vibration_mmps: REAL. Gearbox 4 vibration in mm/s. Example: 5.302.

J5.temperature_C: REAL. Gearbox 5 temperature in Celsius. Example: 60.72.
J5.vibration_mmps: REAL. Gearbox 5 vibration in mm/s. Example: 7.001.

J6.temperature_C: REAL. Gearbox 6 temperature in Celsius. Example: 48.18.
J6.vibration_mmps: REAL. Gearbox 6 vibration in mm/s. Example: 5.74.
